title: Re-open a Maintenance Ticket
description: A repair that was marked as 'complete' yesterday has failed again. The operator needs to re-open the original ticket.

tasks.description: Find the recently closed maintenance ticket for the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the work order that was closed yesterday.

tasks.description: Change the status of the ticket from 'Closed' back to 'Open' or 'Re-opened'.
Add a new log entry explaining that the issue has recurred and re-assign it to the maintenance team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds notes and the ticket appears back in the maintenance queue with a high priority.
